mapper.insert: INSERT INTO attachFiles(boardNo, name, size, extension, newName, fullPath) VALUES(#{boardNo}, #{name}, #{size}, #{extension}, #{newName}, #{fullPath})
mapper.select: SELECT no, boardNo, name, size, extension, newName, fullPath, regdate FROM attachFiles WHERE boardNo=#{boardNo} ORDER BY regdate
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM attachFiles WHERE boardNo=#{boardNo} AND newName=#{newName}
